on software piracy has failed in the eyes of foreign businesses, Steve Ballmer met with Obama and the Chinese leader at the White House to push the issue. Hu Jintao is currently on an official visit to the US. So we were just in a meeting with business leaders, and Steve Ballmer of Microsoft pointed out that their estimate is that only one customer in every 10 of their products is actually paying for it in China, Obama told a news conference in Washington. Obama indicated that Hu Jintao had agreed to take action. "I appreciate his willingness to take new steps to combat the theft of intellectual property," the US president said
